channel.title: MongoHub
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 2.5.13
item.description:
• Can type any value without double quote in the search field, it will be replaced by { "_id": "" }
  • Adding support for retina display (thanks to Patryk Kasperski)
  • Following the strict json for undefined value according to MongoDB Extended JSON" (now, exporting and parsing undefined as { "$undefined": true }
  • Fixing a crash when trying to save an invalid json document
